oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Chief Red Cloud
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait of Indian Chief Red Cloud of the Oglala Lakota. He is wearing a dark jacket, vest, and tie [possibly a pocket watch].

Chief of the Oglala Lakota (1868-1909) and known for Red Cloud's War (1866-1868) in Wyoming and Montana that was between the American Indian Plains tribes and the US Army. Also, related to the Fort Laramie Treaty.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Schleier, T. M. (Theodore M.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Red Cloud, 1822-1909
Indians of North America; Indian reservations; Red Cloud's War, 1866-1867; Fetterman Fight, Wyo., 1866; Wyoming--History; Treaty Indian reservations
Tribal chiefs; Treaties; Clothing and dress; Lapels
